title: Add a TitleAfter game long  lod time
body: so how do I fix this after a game end ands it trys to get to lobby but takes 3min loading. grahpics all on low.

replies.body: You may have a certain option called "close client during game" turned on. Check for that in the client options, make sure to *uncheck* it, and let me know if those after game lobbies show up quicker!
